sentence.Network_en: "You are an artist," she said respectfully.
sentence.Network_cn: “您是一位艺术家，”她毕恭毕敬地说。

sentence.Network_en: "Where to, Corporal?" asked Trooper Fane respectfully.
sentence.Network_cn: “下士，您去哪里？”骑兵费恩毕恭毕敬地问道。

sentence.Network_en: The pilots respectfully represented that they were not at all tired.
sentence.Network_cn: 飞行员郑重表示他们一点也不累.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... respectful 表示敬意 respectfully 尊敬地 respecting 关于.
[推荐]外贸常用英语[旺旺英语论坛] ... respectful 恭敬的，尊重的 respectfully 恭敬地 respective 各自的，各个的.
新浪教育_新浪网 ... )alternatively 意为"二中择一地"; )respectfully 意为"尊敬地,谦恭地"; )respectably 意为"体面地"。.

list.abs: My World: Zi dian 1 ... 定点 At fixed time 恭候 Await respectfully 要不 Or else.
牛津版... ... Yours faithfully（ 你忠实的）主要用于商业书信。 Yours respectfully（ 敬上）只有下级给上级写信时才使用这一结尾词。.
包含请的词语 ... ... [ urge and demand ] 敦促并请求 [ respectfully invite ] 敬请 [ joint invitation ] 众人公开联合邀请.
Character  -... ... 献丑[ show oneself up;show ones immature skill] 呈献[ respectfully present] 供献[ contribute].

entry.tran: 尊重人的;有礼貌的;恭敬的
entry.def: If you are respectful, you show respect for someone.

example.ex: He was always so polite and respectful...
example.tran: 他总是彬彬有礼，尊敬他人。

example.ex: The children in our family are always respectful to their elders...
example.tran: 我们家的孩子对长辈总是恭恭敬敬的。

sentences.sentence: "might I respectfully suggest to the Town Council that they should adopt a policy of masterly inactivity?"

auth_sentence.content: Let's keep looking and talking, respectfully.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Let's keep looking and talking, respectfully.

auth_sentence.content: Respectfully, no; that is not what you wrote.
auth_sentence.res_content: Respectfully, no; that is not what you wrote.

auth_sentence.content: I must respectfully disagree with Casselman's conclusions.

sentences.en: They stood respectfully when he entered the room.
sentences.cn: 当他走进房间时,他们都恭恭敬敬地站着。
